review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick has worked perfectly for me.I bought it primarily because I travel for work and was tired of using my laptop for watching my Netflix and Prime.  It worked exactly as it was supposed to and I was very pleased.  I also use it in the master bedroom to take the place of my playstation.The only con is that I wasn't aware that it still needed a power cord to power it.  It's not a big problem, but you need a power source pretty close by because the cord isn't that long.
author: dusty miller

review: The Firestick was purchased to replace a Nintendo Wi as a Wi-Fi point for a bedroom TV. After an upgrade to an Xfinity Cable Moden/WI_Fi  Router, the Wi had connection problems.After connecting the Fire TV Stick and configuring the WI-FI connection, and purchasing Amazon Prime for access to video on demand, everything on the Fire TV Stick worked great. After loading the Netflix/Hulu/Pandora APPS, Firestick allowed easy access and control of all content that I am seeking. The remote device is radio based vs IR ( no line of sight required) and will control all of the content easily and the remote is easy to understand. Access to Pandora and Prime Music is a plus. The IOS app works well as an alternate control/search  device.In summary, Fire TV Stick is well conceived, easy to implement and use with access to a great deal of content for most every user! A good value for the money!
author: Mike

review: LOVE the Fire TV stick! So easy to use. I just plugged it in and was able to start streaming my Netflix and Amazon Prime in less than 2 minutes. I'm so so so happy I bought this! I only wish I knew it was going to be on the Amazon flash sale. I literally bought it 2 days before it went on sale.
